description: EAZ files can be created using the ArcGIS Explorer SDK. They are compressed using Zip compression. The file Addins.xml is located in the archive's root directory and describes the customizations included in the file.

ArcGIS Explorer add-ins are located in the following directories: Windows XP : \​[user]\​Application Data\​ESRI\​ArcGIS Explorer\​AddIns\​ Windows Vista and 7 : \​[user]\​AppData\​Roaming\​ESRI\​ArcGIS Explorer\​AddIns\​ NOTE: The ArcGIS Explorer SDK requires Microsoft Visual Studio. However, you should check to make sure the SDK supports your version of Visual Studio.
